main event: An unidentified flying object was observed near Olmstead AFB, Pennsylvania on 2-4-54, with a bright white light suddenly disappearing after 20 minutes of observation.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than a star and oval-shaped, brighter than any star, and appeared to go out with a blue fire trail.
Eyewitnesses reported seeing the same bright light suddenly disappear, indicating unusual activity.
The observation took place at a height of 8-10,000 ft and involved a jet approximately 2,000 yards from the observer.
The report indicates that negotiations regarding the observations were handled by an officer of fighter services, but no samples were collected for program.
The conclusion of the report indicated insufficient data for evaluation, leaving the event unexplained.
sighted object: unidentified flying object with a bright white light
witnesses: multiple observers including an officer of fighter services
